      • newsMessageCreateGET

        @RequestMapping(value="/news/create",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String newsMessageCreateGET(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      • newsMessageCreatePOST

        @RequestMapping(value="/news/create",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newsMessageCreatePOST(@ModelAttribute(value="newsMessageVo")
                                                    NewsMessageVO newsMessageVo,
                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to create new news message.
        Parameters:
        newsMessageVo - the news message which was filled in form at front-end. It is grabbed from POST string and validated.
        result - the result of binding form from front-end to an NewsMessageEntity. It is used to determine if there were some errors during binding.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered if the binding has errors otherwise, the string of an address to which the user will be redirected.

      • newsMessageEditPOST

        @RequestMapping(value="/news/{newsMessageId}/edit",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newsMessageEditPOST(@PathVariable(value="newsMessageId")
                                                  int newsMessageId,
                                                  @ModelAttribute(value="newsMessageVo")
                                                  NewsMessageVO newsMessageVo,
                                                  org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles the request to edit a news message.
        Parameters:
        newsMessageId - the id of a news message to be edited.
        result - the result of binding form from front-end to an NewsMessageEntity. It is used to determine if there were some errors during binding.
        Returns:
        the string of a view to be rendered if the binding has errors otherwise, the string of an address to which the user will be redirected.
